page.title: 13STH WINGFIELD - EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Our area provides very little full-time employment so most people have to travel to their place of work. Within the area a small number of men work on farms, at a garage which also sells cars, at a tyre retailers and at Taylor's Mill. Some women work part-time at local pubs and at the village school. The returns to our questionnaire showed the following: F.T.WORK P.T.WORK UNEMPLOYED Men 33 Men 0 Men 2 Women 2 Women 12 Women 4
Male occupations include;coalminers, lorry-drivers,managers and supervisors at factories, salesmen and skilled tradesmen. Female occupations are mainly in the service industries including waitressing,cleaning and child-minding
